articles.title: Michael Dell Says AI Is Going to Be Everywhere - Bloomberg
articles.description: Dell Technologies CEO Michael Dell says artificial intelligence will be everywhere. He talks about a new partnership with Nvidia and ServiceNow. He speaks to Bloomberg's Ed Ludlow at the Dell World Conference event in Las Vegas. (Source: Bloomberg)
